sentences: Mina käin koolis igasoojas. (I go to school every day.)
Ta tõi käigu oma mängu läbi. (He carried out his game through movement.)
Rohevad jühid käes. (The rough edges are in motion.)
context: The Estonian word 'käik' primarily translates to 'movement', especially in the context of physical motion such as walking or any kind of movement.
